name: Linkwarden
longDescription:
Linkwarden is a self-hosted, collaborative bookmark manager designed to collect, organize and archive webpages. It helps prevent link rot by automatically capturing screenshots, PDFs, and single HTML files of bookmarked pages.

Key features include automatic webpage preservation, AI tagging (with optional Ollama integration), collection organization, collaboration tools, full-text search, and browser extensions. The platform supports multiple users, permission management, and public/private sharing options.

Perfect for teams and individuals who want to maintain a organized, preserved collection of web resources. Optional AI tagging can be enabled by connecting to an Ollama instance.
description: Self-hosted collaborative bookmark manager with webpage preservation and optional AI tagging
